publ: by Century Carrier Residential Air-conditioning Equi
name: CarrierSmart
0:
”Alexa, Turn on living room”
”Alexa, Turn off living room”
”Alexa, set living room to 70 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Using this skill, you can control Carrier air conditioner by voice: turn on/off, change operating mode, change fan speed, set temperature and use other functions.
After the user wakes up the speaker by “Alexa, turn on air conditioner” to call this skill, you can easily control the air conditioner. 
Uses must do Account Linking following the steps below:
1. Download ""Carrier Air Condtioner"" app on Android/iOS phone.
2. Register your account in the app.
3. Configure your air conditioner on ""Carrier Air Conditioner"" app by following app instructions and name your device (rename is also possible)
4. Configure your ECHO device with Alexa app and search for the ""Carrier Smart"" skill.
5. Click ""Enable Skill"" of Carrier Smart.
6. Input your ""Carrier Air Conditioner"" app User ID & Password.
7. Talk to Echo ""Alexa, discover devices"". Wait till Echo says "" Discover is completed""
8. Set up is complete. Try to talk to Alexa to control your device.
